snippet: The Federal Reserve is proposing that large foreign banks keep a bigger financial cushion against unexpected losses for their affiliates in the United States.
abstract: Federal Reserve is proposing that large foreign banks keep a bigger financial cushion against unexpected losses for their affiliates in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve is proposing that large foreign banks keep a bigger financial cushion against unexpected losses for their affiliates in the United States.

headline.seo: Fed Proposes New Cash Rules for Big Foreign Banks
headline.main: Fed Proposes New Cash Rules for Big Foreign Banks
headline.print_headline: Fed Proposes New Cash Rules For Big Foreign Banks
